pizzas.name: Classic Pizza
pizzas.description: The pizza that started it all. It will make you feel like you are in Italy, even if you are just in your living room.

pizzas.name: Rompipalle Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza will make you forget all your troubles. It's so good, it will put a smile on your face even if you're having a bad day.

pizzas.name: Fire & Ice Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza is the perfect combination of hot and cold. It will give your taste buds a thrilling experience they won't forget.

pizzas.name: Pizza Di Casa Mia
pizzas.description: This pizza will make you feel like you're eating at home. It has all the flavors and comforts of a homemade pizza.

pizzas.name: Parigina Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza is inspired by the streets of Paris. It's a unique combination of French and Italian flavors that will transport you to the city of love.

pizzas.name: Ettore Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza is named after our chef Ettore. It's his secret recipe that he has perfected over the years. You won't find it anywhere else.

pizzas.name: La Regina Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza is fit for a queen. It's made with the freshest ingredients and the finest toppings. You won't be disappointed.

pizzas.name: Paesana Pizza
pizzas.description: This pizza is a tribute to our Italian heritage. It's made with love and passion, just like Nonna used to make it.
